snippet: Mr. Hoffman developed the government’s Energy Star program and helped shape a treaty to protect the ozone layer.
abstract: John Hoffman, architect of Energy Star who helped shape an international treaty in the 1980s to protect the ozone layer, dies at age 62.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Hoffman developed the government’s Energy Star program and helped shape a treaty to protect the ozone layer.

headline.seo: John Hoffman, Developer of Energy Star, Dies at 62
headline.main: John Hoffman, a Force in Energy Efficiency, Dies at 62
headline.print_headline: John Hoffman, a Force in Energy Efficiency, Dies at 62
